settings.title: Rich text
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc. If you have a large amount of text, you can opt to have it display in two columns instead so that it's much easier to read.

This section also includes the option to add a button in primary or secondary style, and also control the colors, including the option for a gradient background. Since this is rich text, you can also format it as you wish and include links.

settings.htb_heading: How To Buy FROM TIN Rx Pharmacy
settings.htb_content:
1. Find your medication and place an order.

2. You may have to fill out a questionnaire form to help our pharmacist or TIN Rx Partnered Doctor understand your needs.

3. A consultation will be scheduled with a TIN Rx Partnered Doctor, who will grant a prescription if you qualify.

Your medication is shipped when we receive your prescription.

NOTE: If your prescription is not granted a full refund will be provided.

settings.title: SORRY, NO RETURNS
settings.text:
TIN RX Pharmacy online prescriptions are cash-only and do not use an insurance model. You get terrific low prices, but this also means all sales are final.

We cannot accept returns of any prescription medications.

settings.heading: A trusted and accredited Independent pharmacy.

settings.title: Buy Online
settings.text: Get your prescriptions online and never step foot in the pharmacy. Our operations are located in California, with licensed pharmacists, partnered doctors, and a dedicated support staff. We take the pain, hassle, and cost out of getting your prescription medications by using a telehealth model for doctor visits. Please note, all prescription medication purchases must include a valid prescription for the medication you wish to purchase.

settings.title: Discreet Shipping
settings.text: Making sure you receive your medications in a timely manner is our priority. We offer 2-Day UPS shipping as standard. Need it fast? We also offer expedited shipping so you don't miss your meds. Our goal is precise, efficient, and timely delivery of your medications.

settings.title: Dr. TIN Telehealth Visit
settings.text: New prescription medication purchases include a telehealth visit with a TIN Rx partnered doctor. You cannot receive a prescription medications from TIN Rx without a Dr. TIN doctor authorized and valid prescription. If you already have a valid prescription medication you wish to transfer, our pharmacy operations will need to validate it before we can ship your medication.

settings.hp_content: In short our model cuts out the middle man. You must either be written a prescription medication via a TIN Rx partnered doctor during a telehealth visit, or have a valid prescription for the medication you wish to purchase.

settings.heading: Not sure how to proceed?
settings.heading_2: Talk to a TIN pharmacy specialist or start a chat.

settings.logo_text_heading: Get your medications from a real pharmacy.

settings.heading: Our $2 dollar Sildenafil is cheaper than a nice cup of coffee.
settings.text_3: Access to doctor or nurse practioner to talk about your E.D. treatment

settings.hp_content: In short, we cut out the middle man. By skipping over PBM's and 3rd Party Payees we can pass on that savings directly to our patients.

settings.question_1: Can I really do this all online?
settings.answer_1: Yes! There’s a lot of counterfeit Viagra sold online. But at TIN Rx, you can get genuine medication prescribed by a doctor or nurse practitioner and shipped directly from our licensed pharmacies here in California.
settings.question_2: I've heard of Viagra, what is Sildenafil?
settings.answer_2: Branded and generic Viagra contain the same active ingredient, sildenafil citrate. Generic Viagra (sildenafil citrate) comes in 25 mg, 50 mg, and 100 mg tablets.
settings.answer_3: You can indicate a preference for Viagra (sildenafil citrate), Cialis (tadalafil), generic Viagra, generic Cialis, or sildenafil (generic Revatio). Prices vary, and your TIN doctor or nurse practitioner may recommend one medication over another based on your medical history and symptoms.

settings.steps-text: Submit a payment via our online store. It's easy, safe, and fast. Standard shipping is free.

You may be asked to fill out a  5-minute questionnaire, depending on the prescription. These questions are necessary for our Partnered Physicians to properly and effectively administer any consultation where a prescription needs to be given.
Schedule a call with a TIN Rx Partnered Doctor via our online scheduler at your convenience.

Schedule your Partnered Doctor consultation online at your convenience. Our Partnered Doctor will go over your questionnaire, verify any test results, and ask you questions about your health and wellness. Our Partnered Doctors must grant you a prescription.
Prescriptions are shipped discreetly to you via UPS. Refilling your prescription is easy and hassle-free.

settings.heading: Most Searched Meds

settings.title: How does TIN Rx work?
settings.answer:
Book and complete a visit with one of TIN Rx's doctors or specialists. 

If your visit results in a prescription, we'll send your medication right to your door - with free delivery and no strings attached!

settings.title: Is TIN Rx a real pharmacy?
settings.answer: We're a real pharmacy that uses our decades of combined experience to provide you with the same quality medications as any other pharmacy. The only difference is we fill your prescriptions from our San Francisco location and ship them to you!

settings.title: How do I get a prescription?
settings.answer: Simply go to tinrx.com and go through the process seamlessly. TIN Rx offers an easy and affordable prescriptions from our providers. Book and complete your visit. If you are eligible after meeting with our Telehealth prescriber, your script will be sent to our Pharmacy electronically and your medications will be on the way.

settings.title: Where does TIN Rx ship to?
settings.answer: AK, AL, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, HI, IA, ID, IL, IN, LA, MA, ME, MN, MO, MS, MT, NC, ND, NE, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, RI, SC, SD, TX, UT, VA, VT, WA, WI, and WY.

settings.title: How long does an order take to arrive once shipped?
settings.answer: When you order from TIN Rx, your items will be shipped to arrive at the earliest possible date. Depending on where in the United States we are shipping and how long it takes for processing & handling time, orders usually take anywhere between 5-8 business days (plus postal delays). We provide complete tracking information, so you will know where your package is along the way.

settings.title: Will I receive a tracking number for my package?
settings.answer: Tracking numbers will be sent as soon as your order is processed and shipped. Sometimes additional delays may arise that are beyond our control such as postal delays due to inclement weather. Thank you for your patience and understanding!

settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: Shipping with TIN Rx is calculated in your checkout and depends on the product/s ordered. We also offer expedited shipping.

settings.title: What states does TIN Rx offer telehealth?
settings.answer: AK, AL, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, HI, IA, ID, IL, IN, LA, MA, ME, MN, MO, MS, MT, NC, ND, NE, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, RI, SC, SD, TX, UT, VA, VT, WA, WI, and WY.

settings.title: What states does TIN Rx have pharmacy licensure?
settings.answer: AK, AL, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, HI, IA, ID, IL, IN, LA, MA, ME, MN, MO, MS, MT, NC, ND, NE, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, RI, SC, SD, TX, UT, VA, VT, WA, WI, and WY.

settings.title: How much does TIN Rx cost?
settings.answer:
At TIN Rx, you only pay for your prescription, and nothing more. 

We've got your back with all the things you need for an affordable and convenient pharmacy experience. Just head over to generics.tinrx.com, enter in what medication you're looking for, and we'll show how much it will cost. As always, shipping is free on every order!

settings.title: Why is TIN Rx cheaper than my usual pharmacy?
settings.answer: We know it sounds too good to be true, but we are able to offer most medications at a lower price because our prices are not dictated by insurance. We use generic medications whenever possible, meaning you never have to pay for a brand name.

settings.title: When do I get my refills?
settings.answer: Refills are shipped at regular intervals for the length of your prescription. Our pharmacists will time it so your next shipment arrives before you run out!

settings.title: Can I cancel my prescription order?
settings.answer: You may cancel any prescription order that has not already been processed.

settings.title: What is the TIN Rx return policy?
settings.answer: We do not offer returns for any processed prescription order.

settings.title: Can I track my prescription?
settings.answer: You can track your prescriptions by logging into your TIN Rx account. We will also email you the tracking information once your prescription has been shipped.

settings.title: What insurance does TIN Rx accept?
settings.answer:
We don’t accept insurance, but you'll likely still pay less for your medications by using TIN Rx. 

Here's why: 

Instead of paying high co-pays and deductibles for generic drugs with a middleman like an insurer or plan administrator in the mix, we sell these lower cost generics directly to customers at a certain price without any administrative fees that come standard from other pharmacies.

settings.title: I already have a prescription from a non-TIN Rx pharmacy- can I transfer my prescription?
settings.answer: Yes, transferring your prescriptions to TIN Rx is easy! Call us at (+1) 866-468-4679 to transfer!

settings.title: My prescription hasn’t arrived yet. What should I do?
settings.answer: You should have received an email from TIN Rx with your shipment tracking number to track the status of your shipment. If your shipment hasn't arrived or you're unable to find your package, please contact our customer support at 866-468-4679, or email us at info@tinrx.com.

settings.title: How can I transfer my prescription from my pharmacy?
settings.answer:
Transferring your prescriptions to TIN Rx is easy!  

Simply call us at:  628.895.9508 or Fax us at: 628.895.9509 

E-scribe to: TIN RX / Castro San Francisco
